name: The Wurst Buy
description:
The Wurst Buy Black Friday Sale is about to commence! 

Make sure you show up early to get a spot in line, grab your shopping list and get ready to Buy! Buy! Buy!
If you see someone else grab an item you need...go ahead and punch them to knock it out of their hands. Don’t worry about the consequences, we’ve turned off our security cameras for the occasion. We know how important material items are to all of you. Good luck! Don’t get trampled! We hope you find what you need!

Made for a small local Game Jam, with the theme “Chaos”
